 0028:     cdef float eta, u, w, x
 0029:     # chi = - tan(M_PI_2 * alpha_diff)

+0034:     if alpha_diff == 1.0:

+0035:         eta = M_PI_2 # useless but kept to remain faithful to wikipedia entry
    __pyx_v_eta = M_PI_2;

+0036:         x = (1.0 / eta) * ((M_PI_2) * tan(u))
    __pyx_v_x = ((1.0 / ((double)__pyx_v_eta)) * (M_PI_2 * tan(__pyx_v_u)));

 0037:         # x = (1.0 / eta) * ((M_PI_2 + u) * tan(u) - log((M_PI_2 * w * cos(u)) / (M_PI_2 + u)))
 0038:     else:
 0039:         # eta = (1.0 / alpha_diff) * atan(- chi)
+0040:         x = (sin(alpha_diff * u) / (pow(cos(u), 1 / alpha_diff))) * pow(cos(u - (alpha_diff * u)) / w, (1.0 - alpha_diff) / alpha_diff)
  /*else*/ {
    __pyx_v_x = ((sin((__pyx_v_alpha_diff * __pyx_v_u)) / pow(cos(__pyx_v_u), (1.0 / __pyx_v_alpha_diff))) * pow((cos((__pyx_v_u - (__pyx_v_alpha_diff * __pyx_v_u))) / ((double)__pyx_v_w)), ((1.0 - __pyx_v_alpha_diff) / ((double)__pyx_v_alpha_diff))));
  }
  __pyx_L3:;

 0041:         # x = pow((1.0 + chi * chi), 1.0 / (2.0 * alpha_diff)) * \

 0513: # @cythonboundscheck(False)
 0514: # @cythonwraparound(False)
+0515: def ddm_sdv(float v = 0,
/* Python wrapper */

 1437: # Simulate (rt, choice) tuples from: Onstein-Uhlenbeck with flexible bounds -----------------------
 1438: # @cythonboundscheck(False)
 1439: # @cythonwraparound(False)
+1440: def ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre(float v = 0, # drift parameter
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_29ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_20cddm_data_simulation_29ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre = {"ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_29ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, 0};
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_29ornstein_uhlenbeck_pre(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds) {
  float __pyx_v_v;
  float __pyx_v_a;
  float __pyx_v_w;
  float __pyx_v_g;
  float __pyx_v_ndt;
  float __pyx_v_s;
  float __pyx_v_delta_t;
  float __pyx_v_max_t;
  int __pyx_v_n_samples;

 1523: # Simulate (rt, choice) tuples from: Levy Flight with Flex Bound -------------------------------------
 1524: # @cythonboundscheck(False)
 1525: # @cythonwraparound(False)
+1526: def levy_flexbound_pre(float v = 0,
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_31levy_flexbound_pre(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_20cddm_data_simulation_31levy_flexbound_pre = {"levy_flexbound_pre", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_31levy_flexbound_pre, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, 0};
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_20cddm_data_simulation_31levy_flexbound_pre(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds) {
  float __pyx_v_v;
  float __pyx_v_a;
  float __pyx_v_w;
  float __pyx_v_alpha_diff;
  float __pyx_v_ndt;
  float __pyx_v_s;
  float __pyx_v_delta_t;
  float __pyx_v_max_t;
  int __pyx_v_n_samples;
  CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_v_print_info = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_r = 0;
  __Pyx_RefNannyDeclarations

/* … */

  __Pyx_XDECREF(__pyx_t_1);

  __Pyx_INCREF(__pyx_int_neg_1);
  __Pyx_GIVEREF(__pyx_int_neg_1);
  PyList_SET_ITEM(__pyx_t_3, 0, __pyx_int_neg_1);
  __Pyx_INCREF(__pyx_int_1);
  __Pyx_GIVEREF(__pyx_int_1);
  PyList_SET_ITEM(__pyx_t_3, 1, __pyx_int_1);
  if (PyDict_SetItem(__pyx_t_8, __pyx_n_u_possible_choices, __pyx_t_3) < 0) __PYX_ERR(0, 1805, __pyx_L1_error)
  __Pyx_DECREF(__pyx_t_3); __pyx_t_3 = 0;

 1806:            )
 1807: 
 1808: # -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
